DOC.brief_summary: Open label , 1-week daily disposable , dispense study
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Performance Habitual Wearers Bioclear 1-day Lenses When Refitted With Biomedics 1-day Extra 1 Week
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate clinical performance habitual wearer FILCON IV 1 sphere lens refit ocufilcon D asphere 1 week daily disposable wear .
DOC.criteria: Is 18 40 year age ( inclusive ) Has selfreported visual exam last two year Is adapt Avaira sphere contact lens wearer ( least 1 week Avaira sphere ) Has contact lens spherical prescription + 2.25 8.00 ( inclusive ) Has spectacle cylinder 0.75D eye . Can achieve best correct spectacle distance visual acuity 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) good eye . Can achieve distance visual acuity 20/30 ( 0.18 logMAR ) good eye study contact lens . Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood sign information consent letter . Patient contact lens refraction fit within available parameter study lens . Is willing comply wear schedule ( least 5 day per week , > 8 hours/day assume contraindication ) . Is willing comply visit schedule Is habitual wearer Avaira sphere lenses Has CL prescription outside range available parameter study lens . Has spectacle cylinder â‰¥1.00D cylinder either eye . Has history achieve comfortable CL wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hours/day ) Has contact lens best correct distance vision bad 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) either eye . Presence clinically significant ( grade 24 ) anterior segment abnormality Presence ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Pterygium , pinguecula , corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GCP ) bad grade 1 Anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) Seborrheic eczema , Seborrheic conjunctivitis History corneal ulcer fungal infection Poor personal hygiene Has know history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) Has aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . Has Presbyopia dependence spectacle near work contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type eye related clinical research study
